article_title: Carson stumps for support in Windham
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun with a slight chance of thunderstorms this afternoon. High 86F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Doug Ireland direland@eagletribune.com

og.description: WINDHAM — When Dr. Ben Carson took the stage at the Republican presidential debate in Cleveland last week, he dazzled a national viewing audience with his wit and charm.
